Mundana - HTML Bootstrap Template for Bloggers

Free template to kickstart your Bootstrap website

Mundana

HTML Bootstrap Template for Bloggers

< Previous Theme > Next Theme
  • Demo Download Star Fork

    • A blogging theme for Bootstrap 4, highly inspired by Medium's layout.

    Mundana is a responsive HTML Bootstrap Template for Bloggers, compatible with Bootstrap 4.1.3, free for personal and commercial use.

    Mundana is also available as WordPress Jekyll

    Category: HTML, Popular
    Tags: blogging, portfolio, freelancer, full-websites
    Version: Bootstrap 4.1.3
